extendedInfo.description: Serie A Clock Widgets is the first Android app that allows you to have the widgets of every team of the most famous Italian soccer league in only one application.Are you a fan of Milan, Inter or any other Italian team? Using Serie A Clock Widget you will have the clock with your favorite team's crest and colors.Do you want to celebrate the derby of your favorite team? You can install either of the two teams widgets and keep them side by side.Serie A Clock Widget allows you to add to your phone all the teams you want!To add a widget on your HomeScreen:1. Long press a free spot on the homescreen2. Select Serie A Clock Widgets from the available widget list3. Select a teamIf you need support feel free to contact the staff:rockdroid.devs@gmail.com
